argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_shsval | |- ( ( A e. SH /\ B e. SH ) -> ( A +H B ) = ( +h " ( A X. B ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_imassrn | |- ( +h " ( A X. B ) ) C_ ran +h |
| 3 |  | #P_ax-hfvadd | |- +h : ( ~H X. ~H ) --> ~H |
| 4 |  | #P_frn | |- ( +h : ( ~H X. ~H ) --> ~H -> ran +h C_ ~H ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_ax-mp | |- ran +h C_ ~H |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_sstri | |- ( +h " ( A X. B ) ) C_ ~H |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_syl6eqss | |- ( ( A e. SH /\ B e. SH ) -> ( A +H B ) C_ ~H ) |
